app_description: Install packages in a snap, like a wizard!
subtitle: The magical way to install .deb, .rpm, .snap, and .flatpak packages
drag_hint: ğŸ’¡ Tip: Drag and drop package files here to add them!
msg_no_package: Please select a package file first.
msg_installation_failed: Installation failed. Check the log for details.
msg_confirm_clear: Are you sure you want to clear the selection?
msg_confirm_clear_history: Are you sure you want to clear all installation history? This cannot be undone.
msg_confirm_cancel: Are you sure you want to cancel the installation?
msg_no_packages_queue: No packages in queue. Add packages using the browse button or drag and drop.
msg_unsupported_files: The following files are not supported package formats:
tooltip_browse: Browse for package files to add to the installation queue
tooltip_install: Install all packages in the queue
tooltip_remove_queue: Remove selected package from the queue
tooltip_drag_drop: You can drag and drop package files here
shortcuts_display: ğŸ’¡ Shortcuts: Ctrl+O (Open) | Ctrl+I (Install) | F5 (Refresh) | Ctrl+Q (Quit)
error_no_package_manager: No suitable package manager found for this file type.
error_permission_denied: Permission denied. Make sure you have administrative privileges.
error_timeout: Installation timed out. The package may be too large or there may be network issues.
error_verification_failed: Package verification failed. The package may be corrupted or tampered with.
notif_minimized: Application minimized to tray. Double-click to restore.
